name: tinyfn-mcp
description: 500+ deterministic tools for AI agents - eliminate hallucinations in math, conversions, and validations
long_description: TinyFn MCP Server provides AI agents with 500+ deterministic utility functions that always return correct results. LLMs hallucinate on basic math, mess up unit conversions, and can't reliably validate data. TinyFn fixes this with reliable tools for math operations, string manipulation, validation, encoding, date/time handling, and more.
